casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Arthur O. ARMSTRONG. No. 545P06-2. Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 3, 2007. Patricia A. Duffy, Assistant Attorney General, C. Colon Willoughby, Jr., District Attorney, for State of NC.

*119The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 14th day of February 2007 by Defendant for "Petition for Rehearing":

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of May 2007."
